mcq.statement: For how many years did Aurangzeb Alamgir rule over the subcontinent?
mcq.one_liner: Aurangzeb Alamgir ruled over almost the entire subcontinent for a period of **49 years**, making his reign one of the longest among Mughal emperors.

suggestions.topic: Decline: Ahmad Sirhindi, Shah Waliullah, Maratha Empire 1674-1818
